direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the attributes or content of elements, but 'attr' sets specific attributes.
Both methods involve modifying the HTML content of elements, but 'html' sets the inner HTML directly.
Both methods modify the content of elements, but 'prepend' adds content at the beginning.
Both methods modify the content of elements, but 'append' adds content at the end.
Both methods modify the content around elements, but 'before' inserts content before the element.
Both methods modify the content around elements, but 'after' inserts content after the element.
Both methods modify the structure of elements, but 'wrap' surrounds elements with additional HTML.
Both methods modify the structure of elements, but 'unwrap' removes the parent element while keeping its children.
Both methods modify the content of elements, but 'empty' removes all child nodes.
Both methods modify the content of elements, but 'remove' removes the elements entirely.
